text: The Men's pentathlon 1B was one of the events held in Athletics at the 1972 Summer Paralympics in Heidelberg. There were 7 competitors in the event. Patrick Reid of Jamaica won the gold medal. ==Results== ===Final=== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center;" !Rank !!Athlete !! title: Athletics at the 1972 Summer Paralympics – Men's pentathlon 1B
